name: Metal Havoc
description:
An arcade style first person rail shooter, in development now as a Senior capstone project at Columbia College Chicago.

[VERY EARLY ACCESS, FIRST PROTOTYPE BUILD]

Use your trusty magnet gun to take out robotic enemies in this exciting arcade style fps inspired by classic light gun games such as House of the Dead and Time Crisis.

This is the first playable build for playtesting. More updates to come in the coming months as we further development. But feel free to play and leave feedback!

Credits

Ricky Bakersmith - Lead Designer

Luke Uritescu - Programmer

Christopher Womack - Level Designer

Assets Used

Enemy models and animations from Mixamo.com
